titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Moore and Dymoke Lyster, Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to William Bowyear and James Morley, East India Company Resident and factor at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses correspondence between Carim Caun [Karim Khan] and Shaik Saddoon [Sheikh Sa‘dūn]. The negotiations in Shchiras [Shiraz] are also discussed, with a look at the current political situation in the Gulf and including a proposal to form an alliance with Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna]. The trade in raw silk from Ghilan [Gilan] is also examined, including how to transport it to Bushire.
